Created by makeup artist Bobbi Brown, this effortlessly desirable collection of cosmetics and skincare epitomises her modern, less-is-more aesthetic. The brand launched into the UK in 2021 and immediately became a staple of every grown-up makeup bag, alongside brands like Trinny London, Victoria Beckham Beauty, Merit and Glossier.
